title: Wissen Technology | Trainee Analyst | Mumbai
content:
* Education: BTech CSE (Tier 3)
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: 6 months internship in same company
* Date of the Offer: Oct 2023
* Company: Wissen Technology
* Title/Level: Trainee Analyst
* Location: Mumbai (Morgan Stanley office)
* Salary: ₹8 LPA
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 30k
* Stock bonus: None
* Bonus: ₹1.5 Lacs in Oct,2025(As Retention Bonus) +₹1.5Lacs in Oct,2026 (As Retention Bonus)
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹9.5 Lacs
* Benefits: Standard benefits like Medical Insurance, Paid Time off, Sick Leaves etc

title: Oracle Senior Applications Developer | Bengaluru | 1.5 years of experience.
content:
Education: Bachelors Computer Science Engineering (Tier-2 College India)
Years of Experience: 6 months of internship + 1.5 years of FTE experience
Prior Experience: Same as above.
For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience? : NA
For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? : Companies projects gave me an insight about how the things flow and work in an IT organisation
Date of the Offer: 28th March, 24
Company: Oracle
Title/Level: Sr Applications developer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 20.6 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 6.5
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 10-15 % of fixed salary depending upon individual/Team performance.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 29-30 LPA
Benefits: 1 month notice period, Medical insurance claims, Joining welcome kit.
Other details: Interview had an online assessment followed by 3 Technical interviews and a hiring manager round.
yoe: 6 Months Of Internship + 1.5 Years Of Fte Experience

title: [HELP] Lowe's India vs Israel Based Firm || Please help me decide
content:
Education: B.E(Tier -2/3)
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: SDE at Indian FinTech
Prev comp: 11LPA

Company: Radware
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: **24L**
Joining Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 24L

Company: Lowe's India
Title/Level: SDE
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: **19L Fixed**
Joining Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Variable - 1.9L[10%] (Can go up to 200%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock+Variable): **20.9L**
Benefits - Standard Lowe's Benefits

Other Offers - Acuity Knowledge Partner[26.5 including 10% variable + 1-2LPA joining bonus] = **28.5LPA**

FYI : I'm the first Indian for that specfic team, they are looking for somone longterm, so I don't need to fear layoffs, it's a small office in India and no hikes were given last year, but they are doing good this year.

On the other hand Lowe's is a fortune 50, can anyone help me with the WLB, average hike and the variable payout?

**Please help me decide !!!!, need to join on July 1st**
